Hi guys, fantastic design work on the new Family Show spike, I have to ask, how does one become so design savvy? Seeing a real

It's funny because last night I was thinking of a sample that involves shape objects and a canvas, I haven't delved too deep in the new spike to see how your handling the person object in the view, but I was thinking of maybe using a canvas in a main window with DataTemplates for shape objects that inherit from a common interface contract, then tool modules could also expose contracts that shapes may or may not need to be aware of.

Just some thoughts.

-Brett
